Name: Circular
About the game: Circular is an arcade scoring game. You control the circle and move in a circular path. On the way there are thorns from which you need to dodge. Dodging thorns, you earn points and set new records. Over time, the pace of the game accelerates and you have to try not to lose.
Meta Title: Circular: May 27, 2021, INFINITE BRIDGE and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Circular? Check out the release date (May 27, 2021), developer insights from INFINITE BRIDGE, and a complete game summary.
